attributes.action: Stop the plannig application of an abattoir being build within 150meters of a residential estate just because we have the right to peacefull enjoyment of our propetry under article 8 of the human rights act and if this is built we will loose our entitlement to peaceful enjoyment of our property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the residents of oney park rugby wanted to live next to an abattoir we would have moved next to one in our case they are trying to force one on us just because we live next to three prisons these people think we will ot mind. does anyone in the right mind buy a home for children next to one. No they don't and we dont want it either so please support us the more support the more likely they will not build.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
